# vDSP_zvconjD

**Function**

Calculates the complex conjugate of the values in a double-precision vector using the specified stride.

## Declaration

```swift
extern void vDSP_zvconjD(const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __A, vDSP_Stride __IA, const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __C, vDSP_Stride __IC, vDSP_Length __N);
```

## Discussion

This function is the same as [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_zvconj], except for the types of vectors `A` and `C`.

## Single-Vector Complex Conjugation

- **vDSP_zvconj**: Calculates the complex conjugate of the values in a single-precision vector using the specified stride.
